exceptions.tactic: intros cn others pts Hnin Puniq n H.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
n: Equality.sort nat_eqType

Goal:
n \in pts -> n \in nodes

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
nid = nat : Set
Notation seq := list
nodes = [:: cn] ++ pts ++ others : seq nid
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
cn_in = (fun _evar_0_ : (cn \in [:: cn]) || (cn \in pts ++ others) => eq_ind_r [eta is_true] _evar_0_ (mem_cat cn [:: cn] (pts ++ others))) ((fun _evar_0_ : (cn == cn) || (cn \in pts ++ others) => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : bool => _pattern_value_ || (cn \in pts ++ others)) _evar_0_ (mem_seq1 cn cn)) ((fun _evar_0_ : true || (cn \in pts ++ others) => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : bool => _pattern_value_ || (cn \in pts ++ others)) _evar_0_ (eqxx cn)) is_true_true)) : cn \in nodes
locCn : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> valid (getLocal n d) /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom (getLocal n d))
mem_seq1 : forall x y : ?T, (x \in [:: y]) = (x == y) where ?T : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType |- eqType]
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType |- Type] ?P : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType |- ?A -> Type]
getStP_K : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (pf : n \in nodes) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), n \in pts -> getLocal n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStP C pf = m
cohStP : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in pts -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal n d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = PStateT
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType |- Type]
localCoh = fun n : nid => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom h)] : nid -> Pred heap
tpc_coh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soupCoh (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> localCoh n (getLocal n d)] : dstatelet -> Prop
cohStL : forall d : dstatelet, TPCCoh d -> forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> forall l : dynamic id, find log (getLocal n d) = Some l -> dyn_tp l = Log
getStL : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> Log
getStP : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> PStateT
addn0 = fun n : nat => [eta eqP] ((fun _evar_0_ : (fun n0 : nat => is_true (n0 + 0 == n0)) 0 => (nat_ind (fun n0 : nat => n0 + 0 == n0) _evar_0_)^~ n) (eqxx 0) (fun n0 : nat => id)) : right_id 0 addn
this_not_pts : forall this : nat_eqType, this \in pts -> (this == cn) = false
this_not_pts' : forall this : nat_eqType, this == cn -> this \notin pts
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
getStL_Kp : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (pf : n \in nodes) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
getStL_Kc : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (pf : n \in nodes) (m : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
Record finMap (K : ordType) (V : Type) : Type := FinMap { seq_of : seq (K * V); _ : is_true (sorted ord [seq key i | i <- seq_of]) } Arguments finMap _ _%type_scope Arguments FinMap [K] [V]%type_scope [seq_of]%seq_scope
cohMsg = fun (ms : msg TaggedMessage) (y : nat) => if from ms == cn then to ms \in pts /\ msgFromCoordinator (content ms) y else if from ms \in pts then to ms == cn /\ msgFromParticipant (content ms) y else True : msg TaggedMessage -> nat -> Prop Arguments cohMsg _ _%nat_scope
bigop.mem_index_iota : forall (m n : nat) (i : nat_eqType), (i \in bigop.index_iota m n) = (m <= i < n)
rot = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) (s : seq T) => drop n s ++ take n s : forall T : Type, nat -> seq T -> seq T Arguments rot {T}%type_scope _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
subnKC : forall m n : nat, m <= n -> m + (n - m) = n
mem_iota : forall (m n : nat) (i : nat_eqType), (i \in iota m n) = (m <= i < m + n)
iota = fix iota (m n : nat) {struct n} : seq nat := match n with | 0 => [::] | n'.+1 => m :: iota m.+1 n' end : nat -> nat -> seq nat Arguments iota (_ _)%nat_scope
disj_true : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s1 s2 : finMap K V), (forall x : K, x \in supp s1 -> x \notin supp s2) -> disj_spec s1 s2 true
rot_to_arc : forall (T : eqType) (p : seq T) (x y : T), uniq p -> x \in p -> y \in p -> x != y -> rot_to_arc_spec p x y
leq = fun m n : nat => m - n == 0 : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments leq (_ _)%nat_scope
subSn : forall m n : nat, m <= n -> n.+1 - m = (n - m).+1
Variant disj_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s1 s2 : finMap K V) : bool -> Type := disj_true : (forall x : K, x \in supp s1 -> x \notin supp s2) -> disj_spec s1 s2 true | disj_false : forall x : K, x \in supp s1 -> x \in supp s2 -> disj_spec s1 s2 false Arguments disj_spec [K] [V]%type_scope _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments disj_true [K] [V]%type_scope [s1 s2] _%function_scope Arguments disj_false [K] [V]%type_scope [s1 s2 x]
valid_true : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), valid f1 -> valid f2 -> (forall x : K, x \in dom f1 -> x \notin dom f2) -> validUn_spec f1 f2 true
leq_addr : forall m n : nat, n <= n + m
empty_lstate = fix empty_lstate (ns : seq nid) : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) := match ns with | [::] => Unit | n :: ns' => n \\ -> Heap.empty \+ empty_lstate ns' end : seq nid -> union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) Arguments empty_lstate _%seq_scope
bigop.index_iota = fun m n : nat => iota m (n - m) : nat -> nat -> seq nat Arguments bigop.index_iota (_ _)%nat_scope
subnDA : forall m n p : nat, n - (m + p) = n - m - p
leq_subLR : forall m n p : nat, (m - n <= p) = (m <= n + p)
mem_cat : forall (T : eqType) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), (x \in s1 ++ s2) = (x \in s1) || (x \in s2)

```   
intros cn others pts Hnin Puniq n H.  
rewrite mem_cat. intros [H0 | H0].
- assumption.
- rewrite cn_in in H0. discriminate.
```

original: intros cn others pts Hnin Puniq n H. rewrite mem_cat. intros [H0 | H0]. - auto. - rewrite cn_in in H0. discriminate.
